Dear ,

It gives us great pleasure to submit our best and most competitive for provisioning of manpower services to {{ current_company }} based on our correspondence.


{{ current_company }} is honored to offer you the following financial offer hoping to have the chance to provide you with our best level of service through our long experience in the recruitment field.


We at {{ current_company }} have a high-qualified team to manage our professional services in the manpower solutions field to meet client's expectations in both corporate and individual sectors.


Manpower & Price Breakdown Details


Sr. No Job Profession Nationality Qty Monthly Basic Salary (SAR) Monthly Food Housing & Transportation Working Days/Hrs. (Per Week) Contract Duration (24M/ 12M) ELITE ALRAFD Billing Rate Per Employee (SAR /Monthly)
1 Heavy Drivers Pakistan 10 1,500 200 By Client 6 days/8 hours 24M 3,914


The above charge is based upon {{ current_company }} & CLIENT COMPANY NAME taking the following costs:

The above price is given based upon the following assumptions:

  1. CLIENT COMPANY NAME shall pay an advance payment equivalent to two (2) months of the total value of the employee, inclusive of ELITE ALRAFD Services fees as security deposit upon signing the agreement. The advance payment amount will be amended in accordance with the amendment of the provided number employees. Advance payment will be settled back to client upon completion or expiration of the agreement between two parties.

    Sr.No Item Description CLIENT COMPANY NAME
    1 Staff Contract salary Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    2 Overtime Excluded in Monthly billing rate, To be transferred to ELITE ALRAFD for payment.
    3 Food Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    4 Housing & Transport to/from work Provided By Client
    5 Visa/Transfer, Iqama & Labor card Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    6 GOSI Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    7 Medical Insurance (Class C) Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    8 Vacation (21days/Year) / Gratuity (EOSB) Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    9 Workers Air Travel expenses Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    10 Uniform By Client / If ELITE ALRAFD will be invoiced for actual cost
    11 Recruitment, Visa processing Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    12 Exit Re entry Included in Monthly Billing Rate
    13 Baladiya, Drivers License or Any other government registrations By client against actual cost
    14 VAT. Taxes, COC, MOFA By client against actual cost
    15 Quarantine or PCR Cost on Arrival By client against actual cost

  2. All payments and salaries are to be paid on a pro-forma basis to reach the ELITE ALRAFD accounts no later than the 25th of the calendar month.

  3. Salaries payments will be by bank transfer by no later than the 5th of the month following payment of the pro-forma invoice.

  4. CLIENT COMPANY NAME will assume full responsibility for all mobilization and demobilization costs of transportation of employees from ELITE ALRAFD camp to CLIENT COMPANY NAME and CLIENT COMPANY NAME to ELITE ALRAFD Camp – (If any).

  5. CLIENT COMPANY NAME will conduct their own selection process, and ELITE ALRAFD will assume no responsibility for the selection of any proposed outsourced staff.

  6. All overtime will be paid by ELITE ALRAFD upon instruction from by CLIENT COMPANY NAME and in conjunction with point # 1 of this proposal.

  7. Timesheets will be submitted to ELITE ALRAFD and overtime payments passed to ELITE ALRAFD for inclusion with the salary payments to staff no later than 25th of the working calendar month.

  8. These prices reflect the men being outsourced to CLIENT COMPANY NAME as detailed above and are subject to ELITE ALRAFD standard terms and conditions of business. Any variations as per this proposal will be detailed in the agreed terms.

  9. Upon the issue of a signed LOI & Appendix of the contract, ELITE ALRAFD and CLIENT COMPANY NAME will agree a suitable mobilization timeline.

  10. Any Quarantine or PCR test needed on employee arrival to KSA, based on the regulations imposed on any specific nationality by KSA authorities should be billed to CLIENT COMPANY NAME at actuals.

  11. This offer is valid for 5 days.

  12. Contract duration is 24 months.

  13. Prices do not include VAT or any taxes imposed in the future.

Please advise if the above offer is acceptable. Should you require any further queries regarding the above, please feel free to contact us.

Yours faithfully


Authorized Signatory
